A trash can can be used as a temporary storage container for construction materials or other heavy-duty items.
A trash can can be used as a makeshift birdhouse or bird feeder by attaching a birdhouse or bird feeder to the top of the can.
A trash can can be used as a makeshift compost bin by adding food scraps and other organic matter to the can and letting it sit outside to decompose.
A trash can can be used as a portable watering container for plants by filling it with water and using it to water plants.
A trash can can be used as a makeshift greenhouse by covering it with a tarp or plastic sheet and placing plants inside.
